title: The best oil in overall.
description: Have been using Castrol brand for over 20 years with 4 kinds of its oil choices. The EDGE is the best in overall, slightly more money with very good quality. I order whenever there is a discount .
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023

title: Great motor oil
description: I have been using Castrol motor oil products for over 30 years in all of the vehicles that I have owned. I always get at least 200,000 miles out of every car that I buy so I think that the Castrol motor oil is a big part of that success. I would highly recommend Castrol motor oil to anyone who wants to keep their car for a long time and have it run well.
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023

title: Very good engine oil
description: This engine oil is as good as Mobil 1 or Pennzoil. I use it less often than the other two because they have more promotions. But right now, Aug 2023, Castro does have promotions that purchase of 10 quarts will get a $20 gift card. So I got 2. Very good deal. Very good oil.
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023

title: Castrol motor oil
description: Love this motor oil. It gives great mileage . Would definitely recommend the same to my friends and family .
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023

title: Good price on Full Synthetic
description: Good oil and very good price compared to the auto parts stores for Full Synthetic.
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023

title: Is engine oil
description: You can never go wrong with good quality engine oil. Would not put anything else in my vehicle
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023

title: Full Synthetic (SN Plus) at a great price
description: Not much to say. SN Plus rated oil at a price better than going to Autozone or the like.
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023

title: Best thing to make your vehicle last are regular oil changes
description: I'm particular about what I put in my car and don't trust those quick change places to do the job (too many horror stories).  This particular oil is difficult to find in box stores in the weight I need (5W-30) and the high mileage version is impossible to find outside of a parts store where oil is severely marked up.  So Amazon it is for oil and filter.
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
